lo23.communication
Interface ISender

All Known Implementing Classes:
ComManager, CommManagerMock
public interface ISender

This interface is used for send messages to distant users, It's implemented by the network module. Check also IReceiveListener to understand the functioning of messages.

Method Summary

 void sendMulticast()
          Send a message to all users in order to receive a response from each users.
